h3.a: Pella Staff Member of the Month

div.p:
Pella Corporation in Shenandoah, in partnership with Pella Rolscreen Foundation (our charitable arm), support the Staff Member of the Month program. The purpose of the award is to recognize the outstanding educators and support personnel in our school systems who provide excellent instruction, coaching, and a nurturing environment for our area students.
. . .

a.aria-label: Read more about Pella Staff Member of the Month

div.p:
Drivers Education Class 2020
The East Mills Drivers Education class will start on May 11th and will be following the temporary restrictions/changes below:
The Iowa Department of Transportation Driver & Identification Services will allow approved school districts and driver education programs to teach “in classroom” traffic education through distance learning during the . . .

a.aria-label: Read more about Driver's Ed Information

div.p:
SEEKING YARD WORKERS
East Mills CSD is currently seeking summer yard mowing workers. If interested in the position or if you have questions regarding the position, please contact Michael Williams, Maintenance Director at (712) 520-4654 or miwilliams@emschools.org
East Mills CSD is an EOE/AA employer
School Nurse
East Mills Community School District is . . .

a.aria-label: Read more about Employment Opportunities

div.p: Please be advised that the East Mills school buildings were closed to students on March 17 th , 2020 and will stay closed through the end of the 2019-2020 school year. The district will closely monitor the situation and will provide updates as they become available. You may leave a voicemail at the high school at 712-624-8645 or the superintendent’s office at 712-624-8700. These messages go to emails . . .

a.aria-label: Read more about School Closure Information

div.p:
Below are letters containing the most recent coronavirus information as it pertains to our district.
COVID-19 Information
Coronavirus/Travel/Cruise
Extended School Closure
2020 Prom
Academic Update
School Closure Update

a.aria-label: Read more about COVID-19 Updates

div.p:
With the extended flu season and recent concern about the coronavirus, East Mills CSD wanted to remind parents and students about the student illness policy. If you have any questions or concerns, please contact East Mills Elementary (712) 624-8696 or East Mills Jr/Sr High School (712) 624-8645. The student illness policy is linked below.
Student Illness Policy

a.aria-label: Read more about Student Illness Policy

div.p:
East Mills is now taking applications for our 4yr old preschool program. Your child must be 4yrs old on or before September 15, 2020 in order to qualify. The link to the application form is listed below:
PreK Application
Kindergarten Round-Up for East Mills will be April 24th this year. If you have a child that will enroll in Kindergarten for the 2020-21 school year and you will be attending . . .

a.aria-label: Read more about 2020-21 PreK & Kindergarten Applications

div.p:
Have you signed up to receive alerts from the East Mills Messenger Service yet? Through our messenger service, parents can receive alerts about school closings, late starts, early dismissals, event changes, etc.
To get started, parents will need to sign up for an IC Parent Portal account. If you do not have one please contact Jen at the Jr/Sr High School or Leslie at the . . .

div.em: Current conditions as of 29 Apr 06:55 am CDT

td.span: A chance of showers before 11am, then a slight chance of showers after 4pm. Partly sunny, with a high near 67. Windy, with a north northwest wind 17 to 26 mph, with gusts as high as 43 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%. New precipitation amounts of less than a tenth of an inch possible.

A 20 percent chance of showers before 11pm. Mostly cloudy, then gradually becoming clear, with a low around 44. Breezy, with a north northwest wind 16 to 21 mph decreasing to 7 to 12 mph after midnight. Winds could gust as high as 38 mph.
Sunny, with a high near 72. Northwest wind 6 to 8 mph.
